Choiceversial

A small cross-platform mobile application

Choiceversial is a mobile app project made with React Native for cross-platform publishing. It's an application that makes you react on controversial subjects, it also takes all the results in a database through a web api to make clear statistics based on the country of the player.

Skills developed: 1. Javascript with React Native 2. PostgreSQL database 3. Local database hosting 4. RESTApi with Django(Python)

Project site: https://github.com/jaypey/choiceversial

  • Date: June 2020
  • Client:
  • Category: Mobile app

GCoinBot

A basic discord bot with commands that you can add to your own!

GCoinBot is a basic discord bot that integrates a form of economy to any discord server. The bot provides support for a local database integration, transactions and a command to know your balance.

Skills developed: 1. SQlite3 local integration 2. discordpy usage 3. Python scripting.

Project site: https://github.com/jaypey/gcoinbot

  • Date: May 2020
  • Client:
  • Category: Discord Bot

NGen

A web integration of a Python script

NGen is a website that generates a wide selection of fantasy names using an homemade algorithm based on the culture of The Elder Scrolls races. The website is simply the frontend of a Python script.

Skills developed: 1. Django framework 2. Integration of python scripts on websites 3. Deployment of django websites

Project site: http://jayp.pythonanywhere.com/

  • Date: February 2020
  • Client:
  • Category: Python
